sec.title: Tilting operator cab
sec.p: In addition to the requirements of 4.2.2.3, the following applies to tilting operator cabs:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: if the operator cab front, when tilted, becomes a part of the falling object protective structure, it shall comply with 4.2.4.1;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: if a slewing seat is used, it should be adapted to the tilting conditions, for example by damping seat slew;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: operator controls shall be adapted as appropriate;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: emergency egress in tilting position shall be provided.
